sentences.en: " As long as Hung - chien thinks she's submissive,'said Tun - weng , " it's all right.
sentences.cn: 遯 翁道: “ 只要鸿 渐 觉得她柔顺, 就好了.

sentences.en: First you should try to determine what makes you submissive or guilty.
sentences.cn: 首先你应该找出使自己妥协或感到愧疚的原因.

sentences.en: For a while he was submissive.
He went about very quiet, and in a way, submissive.
sentences.cn: 他默默无声地走来走去, 一副唯命是从的样子.

sentences.en: In those days, women were expected to be quiet and submissive.
sentences.cn: 那时的妇女都要寡言恭顺。

sentences.en: Instead of speaking, I smiled; and not a very complacent or submissive smile either.
sentences.cn: 我没说话, 只是微笑, 而且那也不是非常得意或者谦恭的微笑.

sentences.en: People with thought are brave rather than cowardly, aggressive rather than submissive.
sentences.cn: 有思想的人,勇锐超过怯弱, 进取压倒苟安.

sentences.en: Rolling over is avoidance behavior you will observe in extremely submissive dogs.
sentences.cn: 在极度顺从的犬身上,逃避行为还表现为翻身倒下.

sentences.en: She has become submissive and subservient.
She listened to it all with the most steady and submissive attention.
sentences.cn: 她十分沉静、顺从、注意地听着这一切.

sentences.en: She was headstrong , angry and not at all submissive.
sentences.cn: 她倔强,愤恨, 毫不顺从.

sentences.en: Some, who were violent among themselves now appeared as submissive as children.
sentences.cn: 有的在他们自己人中间穷凶极恶,此刻却显得孩子般恭顺.

sentences.en: Some, who when among themslves were most violent, now appeared as submissive as children.
sentences.cn: 有的在他们自己人中间本来穷凶极恶, 此刻却显得孩子般的恭顺.

sentences.en: Their early training programmes them to be obedient and submissive.
sentences.cn: 他们早期受过的教育把他们训练得俯首帖耳、唯命是从.

sentences.en: They never submissive like dogs and horses.
sentences.cn: 它们从不像狗和马那样柔驯.

sentences.en: We won't reward him until he's in a calm submissive behavior.
sentences.cn: 直到他表现顺从了,我们才会奖励他.

words.tran_cn: 连接主句和从句的；从属的
投降；提交（物）；服从；（向法官提出的）意见；谦恭
使服从（subordinate的ing形式）；使成为下级

trans.tran_cn: 顺从的，唯命是从的，柔顺，帖，贴
trans.tran_en: always willing to obey someone and never disagreeing with them, even if they are unkind to you
